ruleDefinitions.Name: digestMailConfiguration
ruleDefinitions.Description: This rule describes the digest mail preferences

ruleDefinitions.Name: extension_billingdatavolumedailyspikeextension
ruleDefinitions.DisplayName: Abnormal rise in daily data volume (preview)
ruleDefinitions.Description: This detection rule automatically analyzes the billing data generated by your application, and can warn you about an unusual increase in your application's billing costs

ruleDefinitions.Name: extension_exceptionchangeextension
ruleDefinitions.Description: This detection rule automatically analyzes the exceptions thrown in your application, and can warn you about unusual patterns in your exception telemetry.

ruleDefinitions.Name: extension_memoryleakextension
ruleDefinitions.Description: This detection rule automatically analyzes the memory consumption of each process in your application, and can warn you about potential memory leaks or increased memory consumption.

ruleDefinitions.Name: extension_securityextensionspackage
ruleDefinitions.Description: This detection rule automatically analyzes the telemetry generated by your application and detects potential security issues.

ruleDefinitions.Name: extension_traceseveritydetector
ruleDefinitions.Description: This detection rule automatically analyzes the trace logs emitted from your application, and can warn you about unusual patterns in the severity of your trace telemetry.

ruleDefinitions.Description: Smart Detection rules notify you of performance anomaly issues.

ruleDefinitions.Name: migrationToAlertRulesCompleted
ruleDefinitions.Description: A configuration that controls the migration state of Smart Detection to Smart Alerts

ruleDefinitions.Name: slowpageloadtime
ruleDefinitions.Description: Smart Detection rules notify you of performance anomaly issues.

ruleDefinitions.Name: slowserverresponsetime
ruleDefinitions.Description: Smart Detection rules notify you of performance anomaly issues.

allOf.query:
requests
| join kind=inner exceptions on operation_Id
| where success == 'False'
| summarize any(timestamp, operation_Id, duration) by innermostMessage
